p:
All reported ML models are based on Kernel Ridge Regression and use the SOAP kernel
37, 50 . SOAP representations were computed with the quippy code ( https://github.com/libAtoms/QUIP). Kernel matrices and training/test splits were generated with the mltools package ( https://github.com/simonwengert/mltools.git). The atomic simulation environment was used throughout to process molecular data
74 .
